name: The Crystal Crafting Challenge (mbossu, Timothee Fageot)
name_original: The Crystal Crafting Challenge (mbossu, Timothee Fageot)
description:
In "The Crystal Crafting Challenge," you'll put your knowledge of crystallography to the test as you navigate through the various obstacles and challenges that arise during the crystal formation process. Your goal is to catch salt molecules and proteins to start forming the crystal while carefully monitoring the solubility gauge. Once you reach the nucleation zone, you must grow the crystal within a strict time limit of 60 seconds, avoiding salt molecules to prevent degradation.

Can you rise to the challenge and become a master of protein crystallization by crafting the ultimate crystal? Play "The Crystal Crafting Challenge" now to find out!

How to play ? 

Move :  ZQSD / Left Joystick

Development team : 

  • Doctoral Student : Bossu Mélanie
  • Graphics : Guillaumont Thibault & Tramontana Luca
  • Programming : Fageot Timothée & Wyatt
  • Sound design : Abiz-Strugala Maël
